flowEntries.description: Guide users through screens that they can access with Salesforce such as those in a Lightning page or a community.
flowEntries.label: Screen Flow

flowEntries.description: Launch a flow in the background when a record is created or updated.
flowEntries.label: Record-Changed Flow

flowEntries.description: Launch a flow in the background at a scheduled time and frequency.
flowEntries.label: Scheduled Flow

flowEntries.description: Launch a flow in the background when a platform event message is received.
flowEntries.label: Platform Event Flow

flowEntries.description: Launch a flow in the background from another flow, a process, a button, or code such as Apex.
flowEntries.label: Autolaunched Flow

flowEntries.description: Create a user account and link it to a third-party service or app.
flowEntries.label: User Provisioning Flow

flowEntries.description: Build a flow for the Field Service Lightning mobile app.
flowEntries.label: Field Service Mobile Flow

flowEntries.description: Let users schedule, modify, and cancel an appointment.
flowEntries.label: Embedded Appointment Management Flow

flowEntries.description: Create self-service forms to collect contact details.
flowEntries.label: Contact Request Flow
